segments.text: I am absolutely astounded by the woman's complete lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is diligently polishing that plate, utterly absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the sink is overflowing right in front of her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A sizable puddle has formed beneath her feet, yet she doesn't flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It truly makes me angry to see such extreme inattention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is so singular, it borders on the absurd.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's missing so many obvious hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are engaged in risky behavior just a few feet away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The unstable stool could easily cause a serious fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost as if she exists in her own separate reality.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm fearful that someone is going to get hurt very soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene feels like a setup for a terrible accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her obliviousness is truly perplexing and frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR
